confirmRequestLedger.waiting: Waiting for confirmation on Ledger Device…

helpIcon.demicals: This field defines the number of decimals that your asset token will be divided in.
helpIcon.scriptDescription: Each validation of a transaction by a Smart Asset’s script increases the transaction fee by 0.004 WAVES. For example, if a regular tx is made for a Smart Asset, the cost is 0.001 + 0.004 = 0.005 WAVES. If an exchange transaction is made, the cost is 0.003 + 0.004 = 0.007 WAVES.
helpIcon.scriptHeader: A Smart Asset is an asset with an attached script that places conditions on every transaction made for the token in question.

totalTokens.headline: This field defines the total tokens supply that your asset will contain.
totalTokens.notReissuable: A non-reissuable asset will be permanently limited to the total token supply defined during these steps.
totalTokens.reissuable: Reissuability allows for additional tokens creation that will be added to the total token supply of asset.

NFT.description: A non-fungible token (NFT) is a unique, individual token existing on the Waves blockchain. Currently, display of NFTs in Waves Wallet and on Waves DEX is not supported. You can see your NFTs in [Waves Explorer](https://wavesexplorer.com/)
NFT.title: You are creating a non-fungible token.

placeholders.description: You can not change the description later

success.title: Your transaction is on the way!

inputHelper.description: If you use this name, your token will be categorised as 'Suspicious' and will be searchable only by ID.
inputHelper.header: This asset name has been taken

termsOfUse.checkbox: I understand that in the case of non-compliance with the rules, my token will be categorised as 'Suspicious', and will be available for search only by ID.

byte.gte: Asset name must be between 4 and 16 bytes long
byte.lte: Asset name must be between 4 and 16 bytes long

validators.descriptionLen: The description is too long. It must be no more than 1,000 bytes.
validators.maxValuePrecision: Invalid number. Enter number from 0 to 8
validators.minValueCount: Entered number must be greater than zero
validators.minValuePrecision: Invalid number. Enter number from 0 to 8
validators.noMoney: Your balance is not enough to pay transaction fees
validators.precisionCount: Total asset count cannot have more decimal places than specified in the Decimals field
